name: Learning OpenTok PHP
description: An OpenTok sample app for handling OpenTok server-side functionality on a PHP server

TOKBOX_API_KEY.description: OpenTok API key: Login to the TokBox Dashboard (https://dashboard.tokbox.com/keys) to get this value

TOKBOX_SECRET.description: OpenTok API secret: Login to the TokBox Dashboard (https://dashboard.tokbox.com/keys) to get this value
